just like. i’m besmirching zuala’s memory for a girl who’s scared of turtles
summary:
fjord: *crying and terrified of the turtle*
beau, having literally punched lightning into a demon: fjord i know it’s scary just...
body:
fjord: *crying and terrified of the turtle*


beau, having literally punched lightning into a demon: fjord i know it’s scary just think of it on its back


everyone else:


caleb, having turned it into the least scary giant thing he could imagine:

Next up on the cutting table: My Feathers series, of Vax, Vex, and Pike inspired #dnd #dice bags! A
 medium of each for the...
body:
Next up on the cutting table:

My Feathers series, of Vax, Vex, and Pike inspired #dnd #dice bags!

A medium of each for the store, (and for the AN Inventory.) Starting work on them now. let’s see if we can get done by weekend’s end!

blog.name: kimabutch
blog.title: Revolutionary
blog.description: I'm Charlie! I'm attempting to tag "cr spoilers" until the subsequent Tuesday, but don't expect perfection. I'm into a lot of things — right now it's mostly Critical Role, but Utena still owns my heart. 22, butch lesbian, she/her. Link to asks!

summary: Also it’s a little safe, but: Cirque Dans La Rue by Plain White T’s for Mollymauk 💜
question: Also it’s a little safe, but: Cirque Dans La Rue by Plain White T’s for Mollymauk 💜
answer:
Big “BECAUSE I’M WEIRD” mood to this one!!

“I wanna make friends with the freaks/ 
I wanna throw down with the clowns that I meet/ 
I wanna have a party in the middle of the street/ 
Invite all the carnies and the crazy acrobats […]
All the people just like me”

Also, “Put me in the front row/ Make my problems disappear” feels like Molly avoiding knowing about Lucien.

Come yell at me about songs that remind you of Critical Role! (Playlist | song masterlist & spreadsheet by disasterhumans | CR music tag)

blog.description: I'm Charlie! I'm attempting to tag "cr spoilers" until the subsequent Tuesday, but don't expect perfection. I'm into a lot of things — right now it's mostly Critical Role, but Utena still owns my heart. 22, butch lesbian, she/her. Link to asks!

summary: I made a post about this a while back but “I See the Light” from Tangled is a QUALITY Fjorester song.
question: I made a post about this a while back but “I See the Light” from Tangled is a QUALITY Fjorester song.
answer:
YES Jester definitely has some Rapunzel vibes to her, doesn’t she?

“All those days watching from the windows/ 
All those years outside looking in/ 
All that time never even knowing/ 
Just how blind I’ve been” 

And Flynn’s lines work for Fjord, too, particularly:

“All those days chasing down a daydream/ 
All those years living in a blur” 

For his chase of Uk’otoa.

(Also, I love your icon :D)

Come yell at me about songs that remind you of Critical Role! (Playlist | song masterlist & spreadsheet by disasterhumans | CR music tag)

blog.name: halfgap

blog.description:
don't take me seriously

mini fics / my writing / tags list

tags: beau w wild shape makes me Emotional
summary: Apparently today’s @beauweek prompt is Class Swap? I’ve been wanting to write a Druid Beau fic for ages but I can’t find the...
body:
Apparently today’s @beauweek prompt is Class Swap? I’ve been wanting to write a Druid Beau fic for ages but I can’t find the time, so uh. Canon Beau’s love for animals makes me cry, and add that to the Keyleth connection… Druid Beau is definitely my fave class swap for her.

Imagine a young Beau who, instead of finding solace in the criminal underworld, finds it in the woods near her family’s winery. A Beau who spends as much time as she can get away with playing in the dirt, surrounded by trees and spending hours watching the animals, the rats & birds & bugs & deer that she loves more than the actual people in her life. Socially awkward Beau falling more in tune with these animals than she ever manages w/ humans. A Beau who one night wanders reaaal deep into those woods after a fight with her parents and accidentally winds up getting touched by a sympathetic/feisty nature spirit. Then suddenly the forest around her is responding to her in ways it never has before, and the deer and squirrels no longer run away or get startled by her presence, and sometimes she can do weird things like make the flowers around her blossom, or light a candle without even touching it, or make her parents’ bedroom smell faintly, inexplicably like skunk spray after they’ve done or said something shitty.

But mostly– imagine Beau getting older and gaining WILD SHAPE. Beauregard with the same gruff, rebellious, awkward, playful asshole personality she has in canon but now SHE CAN TURN INTO ANIMALS. Beau who as a teen was likely forced by her parents to look and act “feminine” and “ladylike,” making her feel awkward and uncomfortable in her own body, so then preferring to spend more time as a rat or wolf or panther or frog than as a human. Then maybe Beau gets involved in crime and smuggling anyway, but now she’s better than any of her accomplices at recon and stealth and getting into impossible locked buildings, and most of them never figure out why.

Fast forward to Beau meeting Fjord and Jester as, like, a fckin mastiff people-watching in Trostenwald or some-shit, and Jester is just like OMG LOOK FJORD, LOOK AT THIS ADORABLE PUPPY DO U THINK SHE HAS AN OWNER?? CAN WE KEEP HER and Fjord is just “wtf jester u can’t call this a puppy, this thing is like 200 pounds.” but then it eventually y’know turns out to be a rude af scrawny human girl who’s like “hey man what the fuck, do you have a problem with my weight ???”

Also uh Beau as a cat chilling with Frumpkin. Beau probably spending half their time traveling as a cat or weasel draped around Jester’s neck Sprinkle-style, until they get the actual pets (then Beau getting lowkey jealous of Sprinkle; they’re *rivals* now). Alternatively she just goes as the RUDEST horse who bucks Molly off whenever he tries to hop on, meanwhile she’s like “Hey Yasha just FYI, you are welcome to ride me anytime u want ;)” And when they do get the pets.. Like, uh. BEAU CAN WILD SHAPE INTO A BLINK DOG. Beau and Nugget would be best friends, these chaotic asshole blink puppy buddies. Also Beau casting Speak With Animals to talk to Prof. Thaddeus like “hey. Hey quick question but WHY DO YOU HAVE TO BE SUCH A DICK? pls work with me here”

Beau would be so chaotic with druid spellcasting in general, she really would be dnd Korra. And when they meet Caduceus he’s probably like “I sense you are one of the Wildmother’s favored ones” and she’s just, “WHOSE mother?? What? Anyway do u wanna see me fry this dude with lightning”

Plus when Beau gets access to flight-capable beasts at level 8 u just know she is gonna want to spend all her time as a bird, soaring in the sky above the group as an owl or crow or hawk, or giving Jester or Nott rides as a giant eagle.. Just Beau still being cagey and shy about displaying affection as a human, but feeling a lot more comfortable being tactile w/ her friends when using wild shape!!!

but also she’d have to multiclass because oh god FUCK THAT TIMELESS BODY SHIT

blog.name: vodmod
blog.description: Quinn, 20, they/them | Everything CR1 tagged 'cr1', CR2 spoilers tagged 'cr spoilers' until Talks Machina each week

summary: Sometimes Matt forgets the NPCs' turns in combat, I like the think that's because they're looking at the utter chaos of the...
body: Sometimes Matt forgets the NPCs’ turns in combat, I like the think that’s because they’re looking at the utter chaos of the Mighty Nein in battle and can’t form a coherent thought, much less an attack.

reblog.comment: Sometimes Matt forgets the NPCs’ turns in combat, I like the think that’s because they’re looking at the utter chaos of the Mighty Nein in battle and can’t form a coherent thought, much less an attack.

blog.name: kimabutch
blog.title: Revolutionary
blog.description: I'm Charlie! I'm attempting to tag "cr spoilers" until the subsequent Tuesday, but don't expect perfection. I'm into a lot of things — right now it's mostly Critical Role, but Utena still owns my heart. 22, butch lesbian, she/her. Link to asks!

summary: As promised, a couple Grog songs! Both "White Flag" by Bishop Briggs and "Glory and Gore" by Lorde work really well for Grog's...
question: As promised, a couple Grog songs! Both "White Flag" by Bishop Briggs and "Glory and Gore" by Lorde work really well for Grog's general philosophy about fighting and honor. Glory and Gore also works for Grog relationship with/in Vox Machina as a whole, too. (-disasterhumans)
answer:
Thank you!!!

I find it hilarious that White Flag’s now been sent in both for Caleb and Grog, because of all the characters that might share character songs, I was NOT expecting it for them :D I love this for Grog “tank” Strongjaw, though:

“Take a hit, shoot me down, shoot me down/ 
I will never hit the ground, hit the ground” 

And this reminds me of his attitude towards Kevdak:

“But I’m still standing cause I won’t forget/
The hell on earth you put me through/ 
I’ll save myself in spite of you” 

Also @saltwaterwarlock​ sent in Glory and Gore for Grog literally only hours before you did — sorry! Great minds think alike?

Come yell at me about songs that remind you of Critical Role! (Playlist | song masterlist & spreadsheet by disasterhumans | CR music tag)

Also @saltwaterwarlock​ sent in Glory and Gore for Grog literally only hours before you did — sorry! Great minds think alike?

Come yell at me about songs that remind you of Critical Role! (Playlist | song masterlist & spreadsheet by disasterhumans | CR music tag)
trail.content:
Thank you!!!

I find it hilarious that White Flag’s now been sent in both for Caleb and Grog, because of all the characters that might share character songs, I was NOT expecting it for them :D I love this for Grog “tank” Strongjaw, though:

“Take a hit, shoot me down, shoot me down/ 
I will never hit the ground, hit the ground” 

And this reminds me of his attitude towards Kevdak:

“But I’m still standing cause I won’t forget/
The hell on earth you put me through/ 
I’ll save myself in spite of you” 

Also @saltwaterwarlock​ sent in Glory and Gore for Grog literally only hours before you did — sorry! Great minds think alike?

Come yell at me about songs that remind you of Critical Role! (Playlist | song masterlist & spreadsheet by disasterhumans | CR music tag)

blog.name: mollymauk-is-fine
blog.title: A Blog About Mollymauk Being Fine
blog.description: He’s fine

tags: im a bit sad today and I wanted to get some thoughts out so I hope yall dont mind a sappy post
summary:
I’ve been thinking a lot about characters lately.
I’ve been thinking a lot about loving a character and wanting them to have a...
body:
I’ve been thinking a lot about characters lately.

I’ve been thinking a lot about loving a character and wanting them to have a happy ending.

I don’t think happy endings are boring, I think they are inspiring.

I think the ability to create a meaningful story without a tragic end is something we should call for more of.

And then I think about Mollymauk, a character who I love more than many other characters and whose creators I trust, and I think he’s fine.

reblog.comment:

I’ve been thinking a lot about characters lately.

I’ve been thinking a lot about loving a character and wanting them to have a happy ending.

I don’t think happy endings are boring, I think they are inspiring.

I think the ability to create a meaningful story without a tragic end is something we should call for more of.

And then I think about Mollymauk, a character who I love more than many other characters and whose creators I trust, and I think he’s fine.

blog.name: twinvax
blog.description: I write and reblog things for my fandoms. Main focus Critical Role. Feel free to send me asks or general headcanons about characters! I have a critical role rp blog! made and role played for Yeza the halfling (chemistyeza.tumblr.com). Asks open!

summary: Nott/Yeza - They read some Tusk Love together.
question: Nott/Yeza - They read some Tusk Love together.
answer:
Nott hands Yeza the book the night after she gets back from the whole giant thing, stealing it from Jester’s bag when she wasn’t looking. She’d liked being distracted by it when walking through the underground tunnels, Beau’s voice wasn’t her favorite to listen to for hours reading something, but it had helped and certainly reminded her that she still really liked being read to. 

Yeza looks at the cover, face already blushing even before he reads the words on the back of what it’s about, and looks back up at Nott with familiar understanding and warmth, “You want me to read this to you, Veth? Interesting choice.” 

She shrugged, “It’s easier finding weird kinky smut in bigger cities then the library in Felderwin. It’s dumb, but I like it, and Jester talks about it all the time.” she said, slightly unsure if this was a good idea after all. 

Her husband smiles though, shifting closer to her on the bed as she finds a comfortable enough place on top of some hard pillows that she found, “Alright then. Let’s see about how far I can read through before we sleep.” he says, opening the book to the first page, eyes shifting over the first few paragraphs silently as the blush brightened and he let out a breath, “Oh wow, it starts fast.” 

Nott hums, leaning against him with her head on his shoulder, looking at the words in the book with him despite the fact he was going to read it aloud soon, “Yeah, it does.” she agrees, smiling as she wraps an arm around his waist. 

He clears his throat, arm moving under her weight while he rests a hand on her back, and starts reading to her.

It’s way more sexy to listen to Yeza read it to her here then it was in the tunnels. It’s so much better in a bed then surrounded by dirt. 

She hides none of her reactions as he reads, and his voice is the best thing she’s fallen asleep to in awhile.
